Pre-Game Insights: A win will take Pakistan to the final while Afghanistan will be keen to open their account in the Super 4s.
Pakistan have a perfect record against Afghanistan in T20Is, having won both previous matches in 2013 and 2019.
Afghanistan's fast bowlers Fazalhaq Farooqi and Naveen-ul-Haq have emerged as match-winners.
Afghanistan's batting department, with players like Najibullah Zadran, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, and Ibrahim Zadran, has shown improvement.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan and Afghanistan are familiar with the UAE conditions, with only three T20I meetings prior to this game.
Naseem Shah, a 19-year-old debutant, has been crucial for Pakistan with five wickets in three matches.
Rahmanullah Gurbaz, with a strike rate of 166.66 in the Asia Cup, presents a serious threat to Pakistan's bowlers.
